Content: Minister Rajitha Senaratne who was appointed for the second time as the Vice Chairman of the World Health Organization returned to the island this morning.A group of Health Ministry Officials and doctors were present at the Katunayake International Airport to welcome the Minister. Religious observances took place to invoke blessings on the Minister. The World Health Organization has appointed Minister Rajitha Senaratne as its Vice Chairman in recognition of his services to the Health field.
